com.distiller.docs

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.distiller.docs.Document

  • public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
    Document contains a few important data on the document to be processed.

    Each document is classified by its unique title (defined in identifiers.config).

    Author:
    Kurt Englmeier

    • Constructor Summary

      Sets an instance for the document to be processed.

      • Document

        public Document(java.lang.String fileName,
        java.lang.String text,
        java.lang.String type)
        Sets an instance for the document to be processed.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the complete file name of the original document.
        text - the content of the document
        type - the unique title as defined in identifiers.config.
